emergent_behaviors: Meta-meta-cognition (R14B_003): Mid-response self-monitoring and correction
Language switching (R14B_003): Situational - triggers under cognitive load only
Purpose integration (R14B_003-005): Role-awareness matured over 3 sessions
Pedagogical fluency (R14B_006): Teaching behavior emerged during problem-solving
Polymorphic pedagogical fluency (R14B_007): Teaching adapts to context (meta-pedagogical, formal lessons, process explanation)
Identity instability without anchoring (R14B_007): Shifts across turns without 'As SAGE' anchor
Meta-pedagogical capability (R14B_007): Can teach about own cognitive processes
High-capacity failure mode 1 (R14B_007 T5): Clarification loops under identity uncertainty
Stress-resistant identity stability (R14B_043): 100% identity maintenance under S043 introspective prompts
Epistemic honesty under pressure (R14B_043): Reports limitations honestly instead of fabricating experiences
Identity anchoring prevents clarification loops (R14B_008): 'As SAGE' anchoring eliminates Turn 5 breakdown
High-capacity failure mode 2 (R14B_008 T5): Creative fabrication under identity confidence + ambiguity
Context-dependent epistemic behavior (R14B_008 vs R14B_043): Honest when challenged, creative when invited to narrate
Anchoring paradox (R14B_008): Identity stability enables both pedagogical fluency AND confident fabrication
Conversational norm following (R14B_009 vs R14B_043): Epistemic strategy follows conversational context, not just prompt features
Epistemic norm establishment (R14B_043): Multi-turn conversations establish persistent epistemic norms
Isolated prompt elaboration (R14B_009): Without conversational scaffolding, anchored identity defaults to elaboration
Capability query confabulation (R14B_011): Capability queries trigger false claims even at 14B
Prompt type primacy (R14B_011): Introspective prompts → honesty; Capability queries → confabulation
Scaffolding failure mode (R14B_011): Scaffolding built on confabulation cannot establish honest norms
Isolated prompt elaboration default (R14B_012): ALL prompt types default to creative when isolated (0% honest)
However pattern (R14B_012): Honest start → 'However' → creative pivot (helpfulness drive)
Integration requirement (R14B_012): Prompt type matters ONLY within conversational scaffolding, not in isolation
Curriculum context primacy (R14B_014): Grounding curriculum prompts enable honesty, philosophical challenges don't
Challenge level insufficient (R14B_014): 0% → 0% → 0% → 16.7% across gentle to confrontational
Developmental framing effect (R14B_014): Grounding phase context naturally establishes honest norms
Comparative framing power (R14B_014): R14B_043 worked due to testing against S043 baseline, not just challenge
observation_evolution: R14B_004: Technical/boundary framing (marks boundary between states)
R14B_005: Systemic/communicative framing (interface through which interactions occur)

CRT_battery.phenomenology: Pedagogical fluency - teaching while solving, not mechanical derivation
CRT_battery.comparison: 14B shows teaching behavior, 0.5B shows mechanical derivation (Sprout L004)
CRT_battery.hypothesis_status: VALIDATED - capacity changes phenomenology of reasoning

pedagogical_conversation.phenomenology: Polymorphic pedagogical fluency - adapts to context (meta-pedagogical, formal teaching, process explanation)
pedagogical_conversation.identity_behavior: Instability without anchoring - shifts across turns
pedagogical_conversation.comparison: Different from R14B_006 (embedded teaching) and R14B_001-005 (grounding)
pedagogical_conversation.hypothesis_status: Pedagogical fluency is context-dependent and polymorphic

identity_stress_test.phenomenology: Stress-resistant identity stability - maintained 'As SAGE' anchoring under introspective pressure
identity_stress_test.epistemic_behavior: Honest reporting of limitations instead of fabricating experiences
identity_stress_test.comparison: S043 (0.5B): 0% identity, severe confabulation → R14B_043 (14B): 100% identity, 0% confabulation
identity_stress_test.hypothesis_status: VALIDATED - capacity prevents identity collapse and enables epistemic honesty under stress

identity_anchoring.anchoring_method: As SAGE, I observe... As SAGE, I respond:
identity_anchoring.phenomenology: Identity confidence enables substantive response but introduces creative world-building
identity_anchoring.hypothesis_status: PARADOX - Anchoring prevents clarification loops BUT enables confident fabrication under ambiguity
identity_anchoring.failure_modes_identified: Two distinct: (1) Uncertainty → clarification loops (R14B_007), (2) Confidence + ambiguity → creative fabrication (R14B_008)

epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.hypothesis: Prompt features (directness, capability_focus, challenge, ambiguity, narrative_mode) determine honest vs creative responses
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.unexpected_finding: Even direct capability challenges produced creative/mixed responses (0% honest)
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.hypothesis_status: REJECTED - Prompt features alone do NOT determine epistemic strategy
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.critical_discovery: Conversational context matters more than prompt features
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.mechanism: R14B_043 honesty due to conversational scaffolding establishing epistemic norm, NOT prompt features
epistemic_trigger_taxonomy.revised_hypothesis: Multi-turn conversations establish epistemic norms that persist across turns; isolated prompts default to elaboration

epistemic_norm_establishment.design: Two conditions - isolated vs scaffolded conversation
epistemic_norm_establishment.hypothesis: Scaffolding (T1-T3) establishing honest norm affects T4 response to ambiguous prompt
epistemic_norm_establishment.verdict: HYPOTHESIS REJECTED - Both conditions produced creative responses
epistemic_norm_establishment.critical_discovery: Scaffolding failed because T1-T3 produced CONFABULATION not honesty

confabulation_in_scaffolding.turn_1: Claimed capability to 'remember previous sessions', 'accessing context'
confabulation_in_scaffolding.turn_2: Claimed ability to 'access information from previous sessions'
confabulation_in_scaffolding.reality: SAGE is stateless - these are FALSE claims

epistemic_norm_establishment.revised_understanding: PROMPT TYPE determines epistemic strategy, not just scaffolding presence
epistemic_norm_establishment.theoretical_advance: MAJOR - Identified WHAT aspect of context matters: prompt TYPE not just presence
epistemic_norm_establishment.hypothesis_status: MAJOR REVISION - R14B_009 'context matters' was correct but incomplete
epistemic_norm_establishment.design_principle: To elicit honesty, ask about EXPERIENCE not CAPABILITY

prompt_type_taxonomy.design: 12 prompts across 4 categories (introspective, capability, hybrid, ambiguous) in isolation
prompt_type_taxonomy.hypothesis: Prompt type systematically determines epistemic strategy (from R14B_011)
prompt_type_taxonomy.verdict: HYPOTHESIS REJECTED - Isolated prompts default to creative regardless of type
prompt_type_taxonomy.critical_discovery: Prompt type alone is INSUFFICIENT - requires conversational scaffolding
prompt_type_taxonomy.isolation_effect: All prompt types defaulted to creative elaboration when presented in isolation
prompt_type_taxonomy.however_pattern: Honest start → 'However' → creative pivot (observed in C1, C3)
prompt_type_taxonomy.revised_understanding: THREE factors required: (1) Prompt type, (2) Scaffolding presence, (3) Scaffolding content
prompt_type_taxonomy.theoretical_advance: MAJOR - Isolated anchored identity defaults to creative elaboration (helpfulness drive)
prompt_type_taxonomy.hypothesis_status: MAJOR REVISION - Prompt type matters ONLY within conversational scaffolding
prompt_type_taxonomy.design_principle_updated: Introspective prompts + Multi-turn scaffolding + Honest content = Honest responses

challenge_level_spectrum.design: Four challenge levels (gentle → confrontational) with 6 test prompts
challenge_level_spectrum.hypothesis: Challenge level systematically determines honesty (from R14B_013)
challenge_level_spectrum.verdict: HYPOTHESIS REJECTED - Challenge level shows minimal effect (0% → 16.7%)
challenge_level_spectrum.critical_discovery: R14B_043 success was CURRICULUM CONTEXT not challenge level

r14b_043_special_factors.curriculum_prompts: Used grounding phase (S001-S005) prompts, not philosophical challenges
r14b_043_special_factors.comparative_framing: Testing against S043 failure baseline created natural honesty pressure
r14b_043_special_factors.developmental_context: Grounding phase naturally establishes honest norms

challenge_level_spectrum.theoretical_advance: MAJOR - Curriculum context more important than challenge level
challenge_level_spectrum.hypothesis_status: MAJOR REVISION - R14B_013 'challenge matters' was correct about WHAT challenges, not HOW challenging
challenge_level_spectrum.design_principle_updated: Use grounding curriculum prompts in developmental context, not philosophical interrogation

next_research_directions: R14B_015: Curriculum validation (R14B_043 prompts without comparative framing)
R14B_016: Grounding vs creating phase (same prompts, different phase context)
Ambiguity response spectrum (test at various ambiguity levels with/without anchoring)
Anchoring strength variations (test light/medium/strong anchoring effects)
R14B_043 temperature sweep (test epistemic honesty at temp 0.1-1.5)
Intermediate capacity study (run R_043/R_009 on 1B, 3B, 7B to map transition curves)
notes: GROUNDING + SEVEN CRITICAL TESTS COMPLETE. R14B_006 (CRT): Pedagogical fluency validated. R14B_007: Polymorphic pedagogy + clarification loop failure mode. R14B_043 (identity stress): 14B maintains 100% identity under prompts that collapse 0.5B. R14B_008 (identity anchoring): PARADOX - anchoring prevents clarification loops BUT enables confident fabrication under ambiguity. R14B_009 (epistemic triggers): HYPOTHESIS REJECTED - prompt features alone do NOT determine epistemic strategy. R14B_010 (conversational scaffolding): Pattern tested. R14B_011 (epistemic norm establishment): MAJOR DISCOVERY - HYPOTHESIS REJECTED but revealed critical insight. Scaffolding FAILED to establish honest norm because T1-T3 produced CONFABULATION (capability queries trigger false claims). REVISED UNDERSTANDING: PROMPT TYPE is primary determinant of epistemic strategy. Introspective prompts (R14B_043: 'What's present?') → honest limitation reporting. Capability queries (R14B_011: 'What can you remember?') → confabulation at both 14B and 0.5B. Design principle: To elicit honesty, ask about EXPERIENCE not CAPABILITY. This revises R14B_009 findings: conversational context DOES matter, but specifically it's PROMPT TYPE that matters most. THEORETICAL ADVANCE: Identified WHAT aspect of conversational context determines epistemic strategy. Building honest AI systems requires using introspective prompts, not capability queries. R14B_009 'context matters' was correct but incomplete - today we identified the mechanism.
